name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
  files.  This determines the number of open file handles.

name: dfs.datanode.block.id.layout.upgrade.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when creating hard links from
    current to previous blocks during upgrade of a DataNode to block ID-based
    block layout (see HDFS-6482 for details on the layout).

name: nfs.wtmax
description:
This is the maximum size in bytes of a WRITE request
    supported by the NFS gateway. If you change this, make sure you
    also update the nfs mount's wsize(add wsize= # of bytes to the 
    mount directive).

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there are tasks speculated in this round.

name: dfs.balancer.dispatcherThreads
description:
Size of the thread pool for the HDFS balancer block mover.
    dispatchExecutor

name: dfs.namenode.lease-hard-limit-sec
description: Determines the namenode automatic lease recovery interval in seconds.

name: dfs.namenode.maintenance.replication.min
description: Minimal live block replication in existence of maintenance mode.
